# [Interview #75: ACOS Signing Report - Erica Sadun, Entry #30](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=75#30)

#### Question

Have we seen Osan'gar anywhere else since his first appearance? (No doubt a RAFO)

#### Robert Jordan

RAFO.
